name: Sonexe
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with riveric loanwords
Tide-festival rituals tied to fishing seasons
Cuisine: salted fish, seaweed, cured shellfish
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Navigational auguries assist but don't replace charts/seamanship
notes: Population unknown; minor inlet port reliant on seasonal trade
Prone to seasonal storms; channel requires frequent dredging
